title: Input schema for Influencer Discovery Agent
description: Provide a list of TikTok Usernames and a prompt on

profiles.title: Usernames
profiles.description: Add one or multiple TikTok usernames you want to evaluate as influencers.

influencerDescription.title: Influencer Description
influencerDescription.description: Explain what are you looking for on the influencer, his style of content and engagement capability. Our Agent will evaluate your candidate and give a brief reasoning on if the candidate aligns well with your expectation.
